website_summaries.verdict: This products is formulated to reduce joint inflammation to help ease your cat's pain.
pros: Offers the glucosamine with added Opti-MSM hyaluronic acid to keep your cat flexible
Liquid is easy to deliver to your cat or place on a small amount of food or drink to administer
Improvements to flexibility and movement come quickly
cons: This product seems to upset the stomach of some cats

website_summaries.verdict: This liquid formula is a nice alternative to pills and chews, and is made with ingredients that are effective at relieving joint issues for many felines.
pros: Combines glucosamine, chondroitin, and hyaluronic acid to lubricate joints and ease inflammation
Liquid formula is easy to dose
Has a beef flavor that most cats enjoy
cons: Some reports of cats experiencing stomach upset and vomiting after taking it

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference in my 16 year old cat
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old Siamese was really struggling to get around and was having a lot of pain in her hips and back legs (along with some heart and urinary problems). We tried another glucosamine product from our vet but the pills were too big to give her and when I mixed the powder in with her food she refused to eat it. I ordered this liquid and I’m really blown away by the difference in her in just a week. She went from constant discomfort and very limited mobility to RUNNING (yes, she ran for the first time in almost a year!!!) this morning. I’m really impressed and thrilled to see her improving so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Claire

customer_reviews.title: Miracle liquid medicine for limping cats.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great on our 11 year old male cat. He was limping heavily on his left front leg for a year until we administered this to him. In 7-10 days it has made an 80-90% improvement in reducing his limp. He's now running all over the place again. We're so happy! I hold him and my wife administers it into his mouth. It has a strong beefy smell to it and BJ acts like it's a cat treat. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: vernon a. norris

customer_reviews.title: *Formula changed* Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: We have been giving this to our arthritic kitty for many months. The most recent bottle we received, the label is a little different and the formula must have changed. Our kitty has an allergic reaction to this product. They must have modified the formula. Be careful giving this to your pet it is not the same as it was!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foeget the treats, gels, or powders, this is what you want!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different joint supplements for my 23 year old cat and this is out favorite so far! First, it's a liquid with a dropper so I can squirt it into his mouth if he doesn't want to take it on his own. Second, he prefers the flavor of this to any of the others we've tried (treats, paw gels, sprinkle powder). Finally it is 59 mL which is almost two months worth and has the same or better quantities of key ingredients than the other products we've tried so the cost works out to be the same as the other products. I will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Uograding rating from 4 to 5 stars after using several months
customer_reviews.text: My Original review below- I can't believe the improvement in my 13 year old cat. She was limping from vet diagnosed age related arthritis in hip. After a couple months of using this she was definitely moving better, after 6 months NO LIMP! and racing around like a kitten. She likes the taste OK just messy to dose with the eye dropper. Switched to this from powdered additive as cat doesn't like wet food. Cat tolerates dosing pretty well. I switched out eye dropper that it came with for an oral dosing syringe and dispenser cap I got from my vet. Now much easier to dispense and administer. Seen definite improvement in cat's mobility.
customer_reviews.author: virginia in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: she is in a much better move and will now let me touch and rub ...
customer_reviews.text: This has done wonders for my baby Sissycat , she is 22 years old and she is now jumping and playing more , she is in a much better move and will now let me touch and rub her hips , she look so forward to getting her meds , I have never seen her like anything as much as she likes this joint supplement... Thank you guys so so much , Sissy is my world ...
customer_reviews.author: J AND S

customer_reviews.title: Jumping up in trees like old times
customer_reviews.text: My oldest cat (10) was acting like his rear legs were stiff (he failed a jump up on my kitchen counter several times) so that is why I purchased this product. The Beef flavor is great and he has no problem with it (I put it in his food). He seems to sleep better and sit better and runs up the trees in my back yard and can now jump up on the counter with ease. I do find it terribly expensive but its certainly better than a vet visit!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Crist

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This really did help my cat. She is about 15 years old, and she has arthritis. She rarely gets off of her heating pad as a result. My vet tried her on Adequan, but that did not work. I then purchased this product although I didn't think it would work. I started giving it to her once a day for about a month. For the first time in months, she is getting off the bed and going down the steps on her own. This product really does work!
customer_reviews.author: P. Felix

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I just started using this product and I just put it in the palm of my hand and me 12 year old male eats it up like a treat. I have had problems getting him to take other joint supplements because of taste. That is not a problem with this one. He is starting to do things he used to do so I think he is feeling the results and it has only been a week.
customer_reviews.author: Millicent

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be good for my elderly cat. I noticed no changes the first week, by week two, I thought I was him starting to sit a little better. But within a few days he barely ate. I stopped giving this to him and within a week he began to eat normally again. I figured it was happens chance, and tried this stuff again a few weeks later, but the same thing happened where he lost his appetite for several days. Overall, this wasnt worth my cat getting sick off of. I would strongly recommend getting supplements through the vet instead, it's worth the cost increase. I tossed what was left in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: LensFD

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Improvement in mobility in first week.
customer_reviews.text: Our 18 year old cat has had hip and leg issues for the past year. After introducing this into her wet food for less than a week ...already she has improved. She is using both back legs and is walking around without dragging her back half. I couldn't be happier. I would definately recommend to anyone that is skeptical. Read the reviews. That's what made me buy this product. All of them are telling the truth. I wish we would have known sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jenjen

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat itchy and aggitated
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not responding well to this product. Every day for the 4 days I administered this, my cat became very irritable, is limping more, and can't seem to focus on objects-with delayed reactions. He is also very itchy around his eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My 16-year old TC has been taking this for about two months now and what an improvement! His movements are much less stiff and when he sits, he doesn't ease himself down in increments but with surety that it's not going to hurt. We prefer this liquid over the powder supplement. He takes it all from the dropper. He always knew when I was mixing his food with the powder and he wouldn't eat it. This way it's down in one gulp and I don't have to worry about it. I have an order in my cart for a second bottle. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Cabbie

customer_reviews.title: So glad to see him feeling better
customer_reviews.text: Only used 2 and can already see a difference in my elderly rescue cat. We have no idea exactly how old he is but we are certain he is in his teen's. recently he has stopped jumping up on the bed with us to sleep and taking breaks between walking from his food dish to his bed on the floor. Starting using this and for the first time in awhile he jumped up on our bed and doesn't seem to take any breaks when walking. So glad to see him feeling better!
customer_reviews.author: RL903

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for pets, don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: On the first day after using this supplement my cat threw up . However, I didn’t realize why. on the next day my cat has felt good until I didn’t give her this supplement. In fact, now I know very well that this supplement emerged vomiting at my cat. Don’t buy it , dangerous for pets.
customer_reviews.author: Solomiya

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My cat is 16 years old and started to squat low from joint pain. After using this product for a good 3 weeks she was like a kitten again. I havent seen her climb up the wall in a few years. She playing with toys again. In the photo I had to get empty water bottles my ferrets hide under the couch and Kitty is her name climbed up on top playing. So thankful for this medicine. Saved us 120 dollar vet bill. Ps it didn’t take 3 weeks for it to work it took a good 1 1/2 week to see sign of no pain. 3 weeks is just when I noticed the playing.
customer_reviews.author: veronica C.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my elder Kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my elder cat because she was walking with very stiff back hip joints. Surprised that she actually eats it (I drop it on her morning food - not by mouth). She usually eats all of her food with this on it! Only been using it a week, but already she is walking with less stiffness. I would definitely recommend this to others :)
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: I’ve noticed a difference in my cats mobility.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for a month with my kitty who is 15 and has a lot of trouble moving around and jumping. I can really notice a difference in his mobility compared to cosequin. He’s been jumping up on the bed and has been just “up and about” more often than he has been. I wouldn’t say that it’s a miracle supplement but I did just reorder it... if it makes him a bit more comfortable in his senior years then it’s definitely worth the price. I think it’s worth a try if you are considering buying this. He doesn’t seem to mind the taste either... I just mix it into his food.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Nodens
customer_reviews.text: When my finicky older cat started limping I started research different ways to administer glucosamine. I just couldn't picture holding her down to get pills or squirt a dose down her throat. It would be traumatizing for both of us! And my cat is horribly picky, she would rather starve than eat something that's not to her taste. I put a dropper full of Nodens on her dry food and she thinks it's a treat! She actually asks for it. And her limp has lessened and some days has disappeared all together. I even catch her playing sometimes!
customer_reviews.author: Melusine

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! My 18 year old cat stopped using her ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! My 18 year old cat stopped using her litter box because her arthritis was too painful. We started her on this (2x a day for two weeks as directed and now we’re on to once a day) and have seen amazing results. She’s super mobile, has started to use her box again, and isn’t walking hunched over like she was. I drop it in a little spoonful of chicken baby food (Gerber brand - the kind for babies!) and she eats it all! It’s truly a great product and I’m purchasing more now.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney D.

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic! My 14- year-old cat stopped limping within two weeks of starting her on Cat Hip and Joint. My only complaint: the dropper has to be filled twice for the recommended dose. But that's a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Defective container, I can't review the product itself yet
customer_reviews.text: I received the product leaking and I can't give it to my cat because it might be contaminated. Container's quality is very poor. You'll think at this price point this product would come in a better container. Will review the product accordingly after I claim for a replacement, until then 1 start is given.
customer_reviews.author: Screamer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: It works! 18 year old kitty was struggling and now she’s at least 50% better. Hops up and down off the bed easier. Visibly better! She eats it from the dropper so the taste is appealing. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: No more clicking! More jumping!
customer_reviews.text: My twelve year old tabby Odin is 21lbs of pure cat meat. Nine months ago I could hear his joints click when he would walk around the house, he was not as active as he once was. My aunt who has decades worth of feline experience sent me the bottle as a gift. I have since purchased this monthly as my dear Odin no longer clicks and, he jumps off tables with ease. I give hm two droppers every evening directly into his mouth as he won't eat if I sneak it into his food. If you are worried about an older cats joints, or are noticing signs of joint pain I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work & my cat got diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved the flavor, however after using this for a few weeks she now has really bad diarrhea. I can’t return the product since it’s already past 30 days. She did like the flavor very much but I didn’t notice any difference in how she was walking. So with no difference and her diarrhea, I decided to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: It it tolerated by  my cat
customer_reviews.text: I tried the recommended dosage for the weight of my cat, however, it made her throw up. So it's best to begin with 2-3 drops first and see how it goes. I was giving it twice a day also and even when I decreased the dosage she vomited her food, so I give it to her only in the AM. My cat is 17 and quite stiff. This helps her to be able to move a bit better. After a year of using this, she is able to jump up on the sofa to sit on my lap and also onto the kitchen chair to get to the table to eat any flowers I may have in a vase. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: R. Francois

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for both of my geriatric gingers. It's been over a month and I hardly saw much of a difference. But I'll give it another few and see since I know things don't happen right away. But this small bottle is quite expensive. I wish they would offer a subscribe and save option. I give 2ml to each cat a day and the bottle lasted me exactly 2 weeks. Calculate the cost when I have to order 2 a month to keep their dosage consistent (close to $44!). Please make bigger bottles and PLEASE consider on lowering the price.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Surprize...It Actually works......
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good.....My senior cat was having problems walking...Limping and pain in his hip....After 4 days he was no longer limping and he was jumping up on things with out problems....Even hubby noticed that he was "walking better".....Hopefully this progress keeps up. My only "con" was this needs to be refrigerated after opening......
customer_reviews.author: Susie Fair

customer_reviews.title: It does work and relieve pain!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, IT WORKS. But, this is one you will have to administer down the throat they more than likely will not willingly eat this on their own mixed in food or anything. Again, it works. When 21yr old cat is having severe pain from joints and arthritis days we give it to her asap, she is relieved relatively fast! We continue homeopathic remedies on the daily and use this for the "bad" days. She is 21 yrs old, we are pleased with the performance of this medicine for her. Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Give it time
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old was limping around a bit before I tried this supplement for her. We are into the second bottle and she is feistier than she has been in years. She plays more and while her gait seems to be not very different, you can tell she is feeling better. She also asks for the stuff! Licks it up like candy from the dropper every morning. If you feel like your kitty could use more ease in their body, try this out and don’t be afraid to give it a couple of months. We really began to notice a change about a month and a half in.
customer_reviews.author: Customer#909

customer_reviews.title: this is NOT beef flavored.I always taste it myself and it is foul tasting.my cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: my cat hates it..bitter taste..trying to find something to mix it with.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: It really works...
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat was at a point where she had difficulty even jumping on the leg-rest of my recliner chair. I read some reviews with reports of day-after results and this was not the case for me; however, her movement started improving about a week into treatment. I was very impressed and while this is certainly no miracle oil, it was great seeing her turn back the clock a couple of years. After a couple of weeks I noticed a big difference in the amount of strength I can feel from her legs when she walks over my lap. I feel like she went from maybe life #8 to life #7 and will certainly purchase the product again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Off to a good start!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my cat that has developed a slight joint cracking/popping noises as she walks. I wanted something that might help with that and to help her out as she gets older. My number one worry was the taste of it. Well, the picky eater loves it! My second worry was that she’d have a reaction and over groom (she’s moved over to limited ingredient food from the vet.) I chose this product over the sprinkle capsules after reading the ingredients. I will update on that and the joint noises in a few weeks (only had it a few days, but now that I know she’ll eat it- fingers are crossed).
customer_reviews.author: Linnea True

customer_reviews.title: It tastes terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This product probably works fine but I'd never make my cat taste anything this bad. And you find out you have to get them to drink a full dropper of it daily. I always taste whatever I'm going to give my cat and this isn't going to happen. Waste of my money for me. My cat would hate me by day 3 if I made him take a dropper of this every day. The product needs work so it has a good taste and can simply be added to food. There is no hiding this in food.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle for price
customer_reviews.text: Cats seem to like product, no GI upset. Small bottle, poor design as the dropper doesn’t pull up the full amount, outside of bottle arrived “”sticky” on 2 shipments, not sure what caused it...poor label quality or product spillage, though no apparent break in seal. Expensive for such a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I’m shocked my cat would actually touch this stuff. He’s very picky. I added the recommended amount to his wet food, as I didn’t want to have to administer it directly into his mouth. He doesn’t seem to notice I’ve added anything, or maybe he actually likes the taste? He’s been taking this for about 2 months now and has been quite playful, jumping around with no problem, at 13 years old. I can’t say for certain that it’s the supplement causing this, but I feel good that I’m giving him something that will help to maintain the integrity of his joints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying for sure
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and so far I think my kitty is doing much better. I will do another follow-up in a couple of weeks. The most important part of this is that I can get it in his mouth so quickly and he doesn't hate it like some other products I have used which are still in the pantry. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Fun to Shop

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Our largest cat (10 years old) suddenly started going outside the litter box, and stopped grooming herself - also her fur started looking matted on her back area. I looked online and saw that both these could be symptoms of arthritis. We started using this oil several months ago, and both problems disappeared within a few days. One time we ran out, and her fur started looking matted again until we got more and started this treatment again. We put about 1/2 dropper full on her morning food, for a 15-pound cat. It is a little pricey, but not when you consider keeping your pet healthy, without drugs or surgery!
customer_reviews.author: enjoylife2040

customer_reviews.title: Cat LOVES this stuff. Moving a bit better...
customer_reviews.text: Cat LOVES the flavor--I put a "well" into his soft food, and he just licks this right on up! Didn't even have to go the syringe down the throat method. He LOVES IT! Joints: I did notice him getting on the couch with a little more ease. He is still limping around, albeit, a little less. I'm still going to take him to the vet. But He seems happier. I noticed he was trying to play with his buddy (our dog) the other morning--which is a really go sign. He's a senior cat, and has arthritis. We hope that this along with his vet visit, will help him gain better mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Angel B Houston

customer_reviews.title: Timely dietary supplement for my 15-year-old
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this for the second time, and will likely continue as a supplement for my fifteen-year-old. At the last exam his vet noticed some stiffness in his hind legs, and after reading the reviews I decided to try this out as a supplement. It does seem to help — four stars for now only because I haven’t seen any Drastic changes as described in some other reviews (to be updated after next vet visit) — but he does seem more comfortable overall (more agile, but not drastically — and overall likes the taste and attention:)
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: My 17 year old cat does not like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old cat does not like the flavor , so I always mix it with chicken broth and she drinks it. Sometimes I have to put soft food in it also. I feel she is walking better in just 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: We use to get a product with a different name ...
customer_reviews.text: We use to get a product with a different name but same ingredients. Couldn't find it anymore and tried some powdered stuff. Did not work, our senior kitty was not playful anymore and not jumping on the couch. Within a week of using this she is chasing her toys and sitting on the bed and couch again. Thank-you so much!
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: Great but too expensive after a while..
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked great for my cat to help keep her cystitis symptoms down but, unfortunately, it is pretty expensive. With her expensive diet and other supplements it has been hard to continue with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: So far i've been through one bottle of this with my 20 year old domestic shorthair and she seems to be improving. She's back to climbing stairs and jumping up on the bed. The fluid that was building up in her back legs has dissipated. She has no problem with the taste and actually seems to enjoy it. I tried Cosequin powder with similar results in the past but she developed a UTI right after and i suspected the Cosequin so i had to stop treatment. So far no problems with this and she's steadily showing signs of improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Rounds

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it works
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product for my cat who has a weak rear end and tends to wobble. She is 17 years old an extremely healthy for her age so I continue to give her this product in the hopes that it's helping somewhere. The only way I could tell if it works as if I stopped giving it to her to see the difference but I'm not going to do that
customer_reviews.author: vana

customer_reviews.title: A TRUE MIRACLE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a miracle! I have a young three legged fur baby. I got her from a shelter that I work at and after we performed her amputation that was caused by trauma, we discovered that she had a torn achilles tendon in her other back leg. I took her to two different specialists and they said that there was basically nothing we could do. It was awfully inflamed and she was limping more and more with each day...then I tried this product AND BOY! She is the craziest, fastest, feistiest little rascal EVER. THANK YOU SO MUCH NODENS! You give animals of all ages a chance at a better life!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: 22 Year-Old Cat showed improvement in a day
customer_reviews.text: He was getting pretty stiff and i found this product. Noticed improvement in one day. I add a few droppers to his food each meal. He is also putting on some weight and his paw pads are better. This cat looks nothing like a 22 year old and is very happy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: alaskacie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a 30 pound, 9 year old cat. He has always had joint pain in his hips. Even when he was a kitten. I started him on this and I can’t believe the improvement! He is jumping up on the couch again and chasing and attacking the dog! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Constance P.

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Arthritis in middle-aged cats. Not only did it give relief after two weeks, but they line up to take it. It must taste better to them than it did to me. Since they are very large cats, I give them two syringes full at a time -- every day to begin -- and then back down to every other day after the first full month..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Twice daily best for big cats
customer_reviews.text: I have found that I need to give my cat a few drops in the morning and the evening. Otherwise, it doesn't work. But he is a big kitty, so that may make the difference in needed dose.
customer_reviews.author: M Moseley

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another product for a couple years on my 18 year old cat. I recently added Nodens to his daily feedings. Within about a week there was a significant change in his behavior. He is now jumping up on things that he has not done for years. He is also starting to follow me around the house, where he was not due to his arthritis in his rear legs. This product actually works. Good deal for my little buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Dirk Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not sold it actually works
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving to my cat for about 2 months. It appears to really dehydrate her. I am not convinced this works, but I will try until the second bottle is empty. she consumes with her food so there has been no problem getting her to take this. I have given 2 stars because I cannot see a change in her behavior, but I have noticed that this appears to dehydrate and give her problems with bowel movements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: My 18 yo cat. A battle arises every time I give it to her. She hates the smell and taste! And after a few weeks she's still limping. Move on to better options.
customer_reviews.author: LAA

customer_reviews.title: Even finicky eaters will like it! :)
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a pretty finicky eater but when I mix this with her wet food, she gobbles it up. I haven't used it long enough to see if it makes a difference or gives her a spring in her step, but I'll update with more info as time goes on. :)
customer_reviews.author: TechieTurtle

customer_reviews.title: Product works for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: This product works! Have an 11 year old male cat that has been limping and has problems jumping up on couch. Vet said all looks great on last visit may have a little arthritis starting. I have been using this product for over one month and noticed results in about 3 weeks. He is not limping anymore and climbs much better. Will continue to use this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Really works and our cat loves the taste!
customer_reviews.text: Nodens has made a noticeable difference in our cat. He is jumping and running around a lot more. He is able to jump up onto places he had quit trying to reach (careful what you wish for huh? LOL). It is very easy to give dosages. We add it to his wet food and he seems to really love the taste of it.
customer_reviews.author: mjp

customer_reviews.title: Do your cat a favor👌
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this product some time to see if it had any affect on my 12 year cat before writing my review. It's been nearly 4 weeks and my old boy is feeling so much better. Before starting treatment, he could barely jump up on the bed, but now, it's like he's half of his age again. No side effects and no problem with him liking the flavor. I give him a half dose twice a day mixed with his food. I'm ready to order another bottle and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Cryochic

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a month, and it shows on my 14 year old cat. He started limping on his front left paw once a month. Then every two weeks. One week. Daily. I tried joint support capsules. Treats. Kibble. He would rather starve then eat it, even when mixed with kitten food. Enter this joint support: he’s obnoxious begging for it, and we’re back to limping only when I miss a dose. He obviously feels better. Nothing more needs to be said. Give this to your senior cat, ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Someone No one

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13 year old cat who suffers from arthritis. I started giving this supplement to him everyday about 2 months ago and I've noticed a difference in his movement. His legs aren't so stiff when he goes up and down the stairs and he's able to jump more easily. The directions say to put 2 doses down the cats throat but since it's beef flavored, I just put it on his wet food at night and he really enjoys it. I will absolutely continue using this product and would recommend it to anyone with a cat who suffers from joint pain or arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Haptonstall

customer_reviews.title: Works so well, I will never try another kind
customer_reviews.text: My 15 cat was in pain every time he walked. I tried this because of all the positive reviews. Within a couple days, he was moving around with no issues at all. I was amazed at how quickly this worked for him. Have already placed another order for this product. It works so well there is no reason for me to try anything else. One impressed customer!
customer_reviews.author: Gibb

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Tried so many different pills but never could get cat to swallow them. Love this product. I place the recommended amount in a saucer and my kitty drinks it up, seeming to love it. Best ever.
customer_reviews.author: wolfcat

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product has done wonders for my 13 year old Maine Coon. She can walk around much easier now and can even manage certain jumps. Her degenerative hips will never be 100% but this product has greatly improved her quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Aasen

customer_reviews.title: Not for cats that are ‘sensitive’ to taste or texture.
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as being something cats would barely notice in their food. My very picky cat wouldn’t go within 3 feet of her bowl when I used it and gave me extremely dirty looks (not kidding). She went on a hunger strike until I completely washed her bowl out. When I tried to give her a few drops via mouth using the dropper after, she put on a big show of gagging, foaming at the mouth and puking (she is quite the drama queen).
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pacetti

customer_reviews.title: In three weeks the stiffness has left my cats hind legs and he is jumping on beds again
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but I do read them when I'm buying something. I have an older cat (a little heavy) whose back legs were getting stiff and periodically he was limping on one of them. I tried the pill joint relievers but he wouldn't take them orally and wouldn't eat what was sprinkled over his food nor the food once it had the joint relievers on it. So I purchased this liquid formula and I can't believe how quickly it has helped and he loves the taste! Truly a day and night difference in 3-4 weeks. No more still legs - at all and no more limping at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Britt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent supplement for older cats with weak and/or painful joints.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 13 year old cat. He was weak and limping, and after adding this to his food for 1-2 weeks, he has really improved and can jump on and off the bed. Before this supplement, he was easily falling over and staggering. Now, a few weeks later, he is jumping up on the bed and is much stronger in his back legs and hips. Will buy again once this bottle runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Crafty4277

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product - I have seen a significant improvement in my 14 year old cat; she is more active and alert. I put it on top of her wet food each morning and she doesn't mind the smell or taste.
customer_reviews.author: Stephiehg

customer_reviews.title: Noden's Cat Hip and Joint relief
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for over a year for my elderly cat who ceased to be playful, and couldn't walk far without stopping. Didn't jump nor climb anymore. The flavor is astonishing (at least for kitty). He would slowly walk over to me as she saw me call her name and show her the eye dropper. She would lick the dropper as I slowly squeezed the contents into her cheek. She just loved it, and she appeared to be able to walk better while taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders for my arthritic cat
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat has arthritis and my vet told me to get a glucosamine supplement. I have been using this for about 3 to 4 weeks now and it has made a huge difference. She is not nearly as stiff as she was. And the best part is that she loves the taste. So do my other cats! I hold up the little syringe and they come running. I have to give my cat a pill twice a day so this works out well. I give her the pill and then I give her the “treat” with this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Read

customer_reviews.title: My finicky kitties have no idea what hit them
customer_reviews.text: My twin sisters are aging, 10 1/2 years now. One used to hesitate to jump on the bathroom counters for water form my teens while getting ready for school, and the other would lay on the couch next to me licking her wrist. I mix the medicine with their canned cat food. I tried the random pool of medicine on the plate and they wouldn't touch it. They have more spunk and friskiness again. I love my girls, thanks for this formula!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hames

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We have been giving this to our 15 year cat Holly for about 3 weeks. I notice a difference in his front leg, not sure if its arthritis or what, but he walks better and has even jumped up on the couch a few times. We have had to lift him up for probably a year or more. Its a little expensive since we are limited income, but it is helping him!
customer_reviews.author: glojo

customer_reviews.title: Yeah
customer_reviews.text: I do not know fully if this product worked or not, bought for my families two very old cats who both are now having all kinds of issues, their joint was one of those issues. I bought in hopes of making them feel better- i do not like that the way you have to give the medicine is straight into the mouth..... ummm have fun with that. What we did is put it in their wet cat food in the morning. I think it works but I’m not sure since I don’t see the cats that often.
customer_reviews.author: Ulyana

customer_reviews.title: Reduction in our cat’s limping! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this. She is only 8 years old, but has a little bit of a limp. We bought this to ease her pain. It definitely reduces her limping and she’ll even start meowing if we don’t give it to her in a timely matter. She obviously feels good. We will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Shnakecharmer

customer_reviews.title: Vet approved!
customer_reviews.text: I started noticing a difference in as little as a week. After a couple months, my cat was able to Kim on the couch and onto the bed. He hadn’t been able to do that for almost a year. At his vet appointment, I took it with me just so he knew what my cat was on and he said, “this is really good stuff” regarding the ingredients and dosaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Just like everyone is saying......my only regret is not starting this sooner. Within 3 days a saw a HUGE improvement in my kitty. She was born with serious joint issues and struggled for a year. I took her to so many vets to help her. This stuff was the solution. I mix it in with her soft food and add a little water. I can’t say enough good things about this product. She is now running and playing like a normal cat! Thank you Nodens!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Graham

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed fine for a few days, then my cat had a seizure, i didnt connect the supplement and kept giving it. Then he had two more, and the only thing different was this suppliment, so i stopped giving it. No more seizures. Dont buy this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product that works
customer_reviews.text: I have an older cat who walked stiff and seemed to have trouble getting around. I have bought this twice and it seems to be helping him some. He is moving around more and although he is still having some trouble it really does appear to be helping him get around better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It keeps her more comfortable in her old age
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to help my old kitty. She can stretch easier and follows the dog & I further on our walks ! I had no trouble getting her to eat it..just mixed it in wet food mixed with a little water and she never hesitated. Thanks ! I will probably reorder...it keeps her more comfortable in her old age...17 !
customer_reviews.author: dundee28

customer_reviews.title: My cat’s legs are stronger now
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had started this years ago! My cat is 21 and moves like an old lady- slow and careful, and if you accidentally pushed on her near her hips, her hind legs would wobble. After a week or so, her hind legs seemed stronger, and she started jumping up on the bed again. She still walks a little gingerly, but I think this product has really helped her. She doesn’t seem to mind the taste at all and it’s easy to give her.
customer_reviews.author: horatio s.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely works well. You couldn’t even pet my cats back with out him being in pain. Now I️ can pet him it doesn’t bother him at all!! This is an excellent product and started working quickly approx 4 days. My cat is 16 and weighs 17 ponds
customer_reviews.author: C. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Trust This For My Cat
customer_reviews.text: I think this product MAY have been starting to ease my kitty's limping but she started to behave oddly around the litter boxes and was a bit lethargic. Due to her history of UTI infections I stopped giving this stuff to her and she returned to normal. Connection? Not sure, but I'm not comfortable with Xanthan gum being one of the ingredients anyway. It's a laboratory creation that can cause issues for many cats. I'm not willing to take the risk. I will have to resort to making my own homemade bone broth instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Beth

customer_reviews.title: I researched these Glucosamine for Cats with great care. This one is good for older cats- ...
customer_reviews.text: I researched these Glucosamine for Cats with great care. This one is good for older cats- some are not! I have a 16 year old cat. She is still very active. I noticed she was favoring her right hip area and was not racing around as much as she usually would. I started this a little over a week ago and she is now jumping, scampering, and playing much more. It seems that not only has it helped her feel physically better, she does not seem as fussy!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My cat starts licking his lips as soon as he sees the bottle. It took a couple of weeks to start to work. My cat is moving so much easier, up a lot more and playing again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vann

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well for my 18 yo cat
customer_reviews.text: This product has really helped our cat. It’s been about two weeks since we’ve been giving it to him (18 yrs old) and he just bounded up the stairs like he was a young cat again.
customer_reviews.author: Paulr_dallas

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for helping my old girl regain her some independence. I was hoping to see her up and frisky as others have said, but I think she’s just a bit older then some. BUT she is definitely feeling better and more mobile now with taking Nodens. Just received our 2nd bottle and will continue to purchase for her and in the future for other kitties to maintain their joints.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything for my cat :-(
customer_reviews.text: I really was hoping that based on other's reviews that this would work for my senior cat. Unfortunately, it did not...even after purchasing two times thinking it may take a bit of time for it to "kick in." Now, this could just be "consumer" specific...I get that not every supplement will work for every animal. I have had great luck with "over the counter" homeopathic supplements in the past for my dogs and cats but this just didn't pan out for us. It's unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: hollyq24

customer_reviews.title: Caring for my senior cat
customer_reviews.text: Elvis is my 14 senior cat. He is a large breed with hip issues. It was breaking my heart to see him walking around in pain. I started giving him the NODENS CAT Hip and Joint Glucosamine for Cats with Chondroitin a couple of weeks ago, one dropper daily. It wasn't until a couple of days ago that I noticed he was walking easier and was able to go out onto the catio, something he hasn't done for awhile. He's not running around but I am hopeful that we will see continued improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hepperle

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be different and more effective than Joint-Perfection. The ingredients are exactly the same, but this is ten dollars more. Though there is no difference with the ingredients, it did seem to work a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Tough Choice

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year cat was having some arthritis problems and thought I'd try this. I use the full dropper as detailed on the directions. My cat was in the twilight zone I think....almost comatose. Tried using about half and was still way to drugged out so I tried just the tip amount 1/4 inch and it seems to work good. I think my cat had some other issues because he died about 1 week after using this joint med. Don't think it had anything to do with it but did seem to relieve the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: We started giving this product to our 19 year old cat and she moves around more comfortably, jumps and climbs stairs which she had given up due to pain in her hips. We had tried a previous product but she refused to it eat. This one we add to a little bit of wet food and she scarfs it up. I'm generally a skeptic but the change in my cat's behavior is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the taste. As soon as she smells it, she'll lick it out of the dropper!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t tilt the bottle or you will be a sticky mess
customer_reviews.text: Are use this on my cat that has stress cystitis which makes her P outside the box only problem I have is the dropper does not feel up to 1 mL only halfway so I tip the bottle trying to Get the dropper full and spilled half of it in my lap because the bottle is dark I cannot tell how much fluid was in it
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. Holton

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Been almost two weeks, seems to be making my old girl (14) feel better. She's out more now, comes to me when she wouldn't before and has resumed laying on the bed. I have to mix it in her wet food and it's fine with a chicken or turkey flavor but she got tired of it mixed in the fish. This is a super picky cat when it comes to her food, too, so any bad taste is well masked.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Full amount take when given orally & it works
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year-old cat has renal issues too, so anything "wet" is better. I give it orally (not in food) since she often walks away from food & I have another cat who will eat remaining food. She's not keen on oral administration but i know she's getting the full amount. Gone through one bottle already and I do see a difference. Just bought more, so I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: Great value for feline relief
customer_reviews.text: My cat has not gotten entirely better but we did see almost immediate results after putting 1 ml of this in her food for a week. She was having issues jumping from even small areas and now she has no problems with those at all. She’s still not trying the bigger jumps but for the value, this is great stuff! She’s even okay eating it cold so the flavor must be good.
customer_reviews.author: A. McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Measuring dosage
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and have just begun giving it to our elder cat so I cannot review the product itself. I will do that after a week of administering it. This preliminary review is for the applicator that is supplied. The eyedropper does not have any measurements indicated so it's a guess as to how much 1 or 2 ml is. To the manufacturer : how about changing the eyedropper to one that is more customer friendly ????
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast! My 7 years old cat had pain issues near her back leg, due to a fall off the bed as a kitten. After her third use of this product we noticed an improvement. Currently we are almost three weeks in and she is doing great. She is more friendly and patient with her brother. She also started playing more.
customer_reviews.author: NirahD

customer_reviews.title: From Awfully Arthritic Cat to Perky Pet Quite Quickly
customer_reviews.text: My 16-year-old cat, Charlotte, who was limping and in the clutches of arthritis perked right up within about a week of me administering this to her by adding it to wet food once daily. She loves it, and she is back to her old, bouncy self. Not bad for a geriatric cat, and just plain wondrous for an affordable product that lasts about 2 months. All good if you ask this Kansan owner of 5 cats!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Thomas Johnston

customer_reviews.title: I have my kitten back! UPDATE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old cat had trouble jumping to the couch and bed. I bought stairs to help her. She was still very slow and I could tell she was in pain. After starting to use the Nodens she improved greatly. She now jumps and runs like a young cat. She also lost the weight she had gained from just laying around all the time. My cat started using this in April of 2019. She is 14 years old now and behaves like she is only a year old. Will keep using this for the rest of her life.
customer_reviews.author: playnice58

customer_reviews.title: My cat licks it off my palm!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this stuff. So much easier to give than a pill. And it definitely seems to help her get up the stairs - she doesn't cry as much as she used to.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Great for older cats with hip/joint issues.
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old cat has been on this for about a month now and you can see a difference in how he walks and he does not seem to be in as much pain.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

product_meta.title: NODENS CAT Hip and Joint Glucosamine for Cats with Chondroitin and Opti-MSM Hyaluronic Acid for Improved Joint Flexibility and Pain Relief from Inflammation and Arthritis 2 floz
product_meta.description:
NODENS CAT HIP and JOINT provides nutritional support to maintain healthy joints, ligaments and cartilage.

 

The most widely used joint ingredients available in one product.

 

Nodens Cat Hip and Joint uses UNBEATEN HUMAN GRADE Joint repair nutrients

 

Key joint support nutrients including 260 mg of Green GrownTM Glucosamine Hcl USP, 120 mg of Opti-MSM and 50 mg of Chondroitin USP in each serving. 1 mg Manganese Chelate: Essential part of the enzyme involved in the synthesis of Chondroitin sulfate and 10 mg of Hyaluronic Acid. Known as "the moisture molecule," Due to its water-binding properties, Hyaluronic Acid can support the lubrication of joints and is beneficial for skin, gum, and eye health as well. 100 mg Taurine. A Taurine deficiency can cause numerous health-related issues in cats. Because cats secrete Taurine through bile acids, they must get this amino acid through food or supplements. 

Administered regularly NODENS CAT HIP and JOINT can help to:


Reduce pain, swelling and stiffness, Improve circulation and cell vitality, Support joint flexibility and mobility, Provide comprehensive joint nutrition, Maintain healthy cartilage and connective tissue  

DOSAGE:

 Under 10 lb Cat - 1 ml Over 10 lb Cat - 2 ml How Long will it last? 2 fl oz Bottle (59 ml) 1 - 10 lb Cat - 59 days 

The Pipette/dropper will draw 1 ml of liquid. Raised measurements are along the side of the plastic pipette.
feature_bullets: VETS AGREE – Glucosamine, Chondroitin, Hyaluronic acid and Opti-MSM combination CAT joint supplement helps reduce inflammation pain associated with Osteoarthritis & degenerative joint disease in Senior cats.

CONVENIENT and EASY to FEED with your cat’s daily meals, Super Absorption Liquid Formula, TASTY Beef flavour, Cats love it! - Feed less, Lasts longer, One 59ml bottle will last an average cat 2 months!

UNBEATEN HUMAN GRADE – Joint repair nutrients 260mg GreenGrown Glucosamine Hcl: USP grade, 50mg Chondroitin USP, 10mg Hyaluronic acid, 120mg Opti-MSM, 100mg Taurine and 50mg Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) Administer during or after the cat has eaten to avoid gastrointestinal upset.

FAST RESULTS - BETTER MOBILITY in a week - Happier Cats, more energetic cats can jump & play & have fun Pain FREE! No negative side effects. CAT HIP & JOINT - Manage Hip and joint pain. Supports joint and cartilage for a healthier Cat and improved joint flexibility. Helps Protect your cat from further cartilage breakdown, can reverse the effects of joint damage.

BEST HIP and JOINT supplement for Cats - PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA – from 100% pure high quality human grade ingredients. Safe and Natural. For older or larger Cats, you may want to consider a Liquid glucosamine supplement. Customers are seeing Results in as little as a few days - Covered by Amazons 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
